name: Yoga - Birkram 26/2
description: Twenty-six and Two is a Birkham yoga class that consist of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises. This class is designed to challenge the body and mind by using specific sequence and dialogue that focuses on alignment, strength building and flexibility.
fullDescription: Twenty-six and Two is a Birkham yoga class that consist of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises. This class is designed to challenge the body and mind by using specific sequence and dialogue that focuses on alignment, strength building and flexibility.
whatTheyOffer: Twenty-six and Two is a Birkham yoga class that consist of 26 postures and 2 breathing exercises. This class is designed to challenge the body and mind by using specific sequence and dialogue that focuses on alignment, strength building and flexibility.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
